responses.rationale: Describes a measure taken ("destroyed birds to lower transmission") without active reassurance.
Describes a future possibility ("we will be able to eliminate this") based on conditions, without active reassurance.
Describes facts about cases and slaughtering, not capability/preparedness.
Describes the nature of the virus, not capability/preparedness.
Describes how the virus spreads, not capability/preparedness.
Describes ongoing work/capabilities ("working on blood tests", "will analyse") without active reassurance.
Describes a potential future risk, not capability/preparedness.
Describes past successful control measures ("reined in and stamped out") without active reassurance.
Describes the virus and a potential future impact, not capability/preparedness.
Describes a recommended safeguard ("urging dairy workers to wear personal protective equipment") without active reassurance.
Describes past budget issues, not capability/preparedness.
Describes preparedness ("it is preparing") without explicitly linking it to current calm or safety.
Describes expected future price increases, not capability/preparedness.
Describes a recommended safeguard ("should take precautions") without active reassurance.
Describes a risk factor, not capability/preparedness.
Describes a planned safeguard ("will start vaccinating birds") without active reassurance.
Describes the impact of the outbreak, not capability/preparedness.
